subject: Re: [sugar] username
body:
Alexandre,

   > Hi, When we first boot an XO, we must enter an username. After
   > that, we can't change it (as long as I know), until another build
   > is installed. Where is this username stored?

It's in /home/olpc/.sugar/default/config.

- Chris.
-- 
Chris Ball
